duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop detailed ITS and Signal plans using Bentley platform CADD drafting for traffic signals, fiber-optic communications cable routing, and ITS plans.
Optimize traffic signal timing plans and conduct traffic signal electrical details testing.
Conduct field work including verification of traffic signal operations, travel time studies, and implementation of optimized traffic signal timing plans.
Survey and route selection for fiber-optic communications plans, closed-circuit television camera (CCTV), and dynamic message sign (DMS) locations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an ABET accredited program or equivalent combination of education and experience. PE required.
IMSA Level II and PTOE certification preferred.
